webscript.description:
Upload file content and meta-data into repository.
Request URL MUST contain parameter - assoctype, which means the child association type. Also URL can contain parameter - contenttype, it is not required.
HTML form data
  • filedata, (mandatory) HTML type file
  • destination, (mandatory) target node path
  • overwrite (not required) it works like api/upload parameter

Return content
  • nodeRef

Return status: STATUS_OK (200)
